name: Alchemy Arena (jiaweikhong, ashlyn444, cmetramexs, khaivanchery, pencilleaf)
name_original: Alchemy Arena (jiaweikhong, ashlyn444, cmetramexs, khaivanchery, pencilleaf)
description: Alchemy Arena is a casual 2D platform game that pits four players against each other in a local multiplayer setting. In this game, players take on the role of alchemists who have traveled from the corners of the world to compete in the Alchemy Arena and battle it out using their potions.
